summary:
On 4/30/10, an employee found 3 breakfast slips dated 4/30/10 hanging out of a shred-it bin located at the 3rd floor service elevators. The employee removed the documents, inspected them, and found patient last name, first name, last 4 of social security number, and room assignments. Also found was a single page inpatient roster with provider name. The roster contained a listing of 23 patients, first name, last name, middle initial, last 4 of the social security number, age, admission date, days, ward, room/bed. Another page found contained handwritten notes, but did not appear to contain any privacy violations, or entitled visit flow sheet.
Incident Update
05/01/10:
The documents were surrendered and secured by the Acting Privacy Officer.
05/03/10:
All 26 patients will be sent letters of notification.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
